STATUS_DESCRIPTION: Draft status is used to define a calculation in its early stages before it is approved or rejected by the Fund Manager
Active status is used for representing the calculation versions that are being actively used in production
Pending status is used for the calculations that require the attention of the Fund Manager for approval or rejection
Complete status is used for representing the calculation versions that have met all the requirements and will require the Executive Office approval
Incomplete status is used to mark the calculations that require the attention of the version creator after being reviewed by the Fund Manager
